학력
1982 - 1988 : B. S., Department of Biology, College of Natural Sciences, Pusan National University, Busan, Korea
1988 - 1990 : M. S., Department of Biology, Graduate School, Pusan National University, Busan, Korea
1990 - 1993 : Ph. D., Department of Biology, Graduate School, Pusan National University, Busan, Korea
경력
1993 - 1996 : Visiting Fellow, Medicine Branch, Division of Clinical Sciences, National Cancer Institute, National Institutes of Health (NIH), USA
1996 - 1998 : Research Associate, Department of Radiation Medicine, Lombardi Cancer Center, Georgetown University Medical Center, USA
1998 - 2004 : Senior Investigator, Laboratory of Radiation Effect, Korea Institute of Radiological & Medical Sciences, Seoul, Korea
2004 - 2007 : Chief, Principle Investigator, Laboratory of Radiation Experimental Therapeutics, Korea Institute of Radiological & Medical Sciences, Seoul, Korea
2007 - 2013 : Professor, Laboratory of Molecular Biochemistry, Department of Chemistry, Hanyang University
2014 - : Professor, Laboratory of Molecular Biochemistry, Department of Life Science, Hanyang University
